languages.text: Проставить необходимые штампы оказалось не так просто ввиду разрозненности Адептус Администратум. Однако Вольному Торговцу осталось лишь вернуться на Даргонус и заверить грамоту у мастера Печатей.

traits.locale_text: Проставить необходимые штампы оказалось не так просто ввиду разрозненности Адептус Администратум. Однако Вольному Торговцу осталось лишь вернуться на Даргонус и заверить грамоту у мастера Печатей.

languages.text: Getting the required seals turned out to be quite a task due to the distance and lack of coordination between different Adeptus Administratum branches. Now the Rogue Trader just needs to return to Dargonus and certify the document with the Master of Seals.
languages.original_text: Проставить необходимые штампы оказалось не так просто ввиду разрозненности Адептус Администратум. Однако Вольному Торговцу осталось лишь вернуться на Даргонус и заверить грамоту у мастера Печатей.

traits.locale_text: Getting the required seals turned out to be quite a task due to the distance and lack of coordination between different Adeptus Administratum branches. Now the Rogue Trader just needs to return to Dargonus and certify the document with the Master of Seals.

Getting the required seals turned out to be quite a task due to the distance and lack of coordination between different Adeptus Administratum branches. Now the Rogue Trader just needs to return to Dargonus and certify the document with the Master of Seals.

Getting the required seals turned out to be quite a task due to the distance and lack of coordination between different Adeptus Administratum branches. Now the Rogue Trader just needs to return to Dargonus and certify the document with the Master of Seals.

languages.text: Il n'a pas été facile d'obtenir les sceaux nécessaires en raison de la distance entre les différentes branches de l'Adeptus Administratum et de leur manque de coordination. {mf|Le libre-marchand|La libre-marchande} n'a plus qu'à retourner sur Dargonus pour faire certifier le document par la maîtresse des sceaux.
languages.original_text: Getting the required seals turned out to be quite a task due to the distance and lack of coordination between different Adeptus Administratum branches. Now the Rogue Trader just needs to return to Dargonus and certify the document with the Master of Seals.

traits.locale_text: Il n'a pas été facile d'obtenir les sceaux nécessaires en raison de la distance entre les différentes branches de l'Adeptus Administratum et de leur manque de coordination. {mf|Le libre-marchand|La libre-marchande} n'a plus qu'à retourner sur Dargonus pour faire certifier le document par la maîtresse des sceaux.

languages.text: 由于帝国内政部不同部门之间相距过远，缺乏协调，获得印章的过程相当耗费时间。现在，行商浪人只要回到达戈努斯，要求印章大师认证这份文件即可。
languages.original_text: Getting the required seals turned out to be quite a task due to the distance and lack of coordination between different Adeptus Administratum branches. Now the Rogue Trader just needs to return to Dargonus and certify the document with the Master of Seals.

traits.locale_text: 由于帝国内政部不同部门之间相距过远，缺乏协调，获得印章的过程相当耗费时间。现在，行商浪人只要回到达戈努斯，要求印章大师认证这份文件即可。

languages.text: 帝国行政局の各支部が距離的に離れており、調整不足であるため、必要な印章を手に入れることが相当大変な作業であることが判明した。あとは自由開拓者がダルゴナスに戻り、印章長に書類を認証してもらえば良い。
languages.original_text: Getting the required seals turned out to be quite a task due to the distance and lack of coordination between different Adeptus Administratum branches. Now the Rogue Trader just needs to return to Dargonus and certify the document with the Master of Seals.

traits.locale_text: 帝国行政局の各支部が距離的に離れており、調整不足であるため、必要な印章を手に入れることが相当大変な作業であることが判明した。あとは自由開拓者がダルゴナスに戻り、印章長に書類を認証してもらえば良い。

languages.text: Es hat sich als recht aufwändig erwiesen, die nötigen Siegel zu beschaffen, weil zwischen den verschiedenen Filialen des Adeptus Administratum große Distanzen liegen und wenig Koordination herrscht. Nun muss {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} nur noch nach Dargonus zurückkehren und das Dokument beim Meister der Siegel beglaubigen lassen.
languages.original_text: Getting the required seals turned out to be quite a task due to the distance and lack of coordination between different Adeptus Administratum branches. Now the Rogue Trader just needs to return to Dargonus and certify the document with the Master of Seals.

traits.locale_text: Es hat sich als recht aufwändig erwiesen, die nötigen Siegel zu beschaffen, weil zwischen den verschiedenen Filialen des Adeptus Administratum große Distanzen liegen und wenig Koordination herrscht. Nun muss {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} nur noch nach Dargonus zurückkehren und das Dokument beim Meister der Siegel beglaubigen lassen.

languages.text: Conseguir los sellos necesarios ha resultado ser una tarea considerable dadas las distancias involucradas y dada la falta de coordinación entre ramas del Adeptus Administratum. Ahora, {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente solo tiene que volver a Dargonus y certificar el nuevo documento con la Maestra de Sellos.
languages.original_text: Getting the required seals turned out to be quite a task due to the distance and lack of coordination between different Adeptus Administratum branches. Now the Rogue Trader just needs to return to Dargonus and certify the document with the Master of Seals.

traits.locale_text: Conseguir los sellos necesarios ha resultado ser una tarea considerable dadas las distancias involucradas y dada la falta de coordinación entre ramas del Adeptus Administratum. Ahora, {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente solo tiene que volver a Dargonus y certificar el nuevo documento con la Maestra de Sellos.

languages.text: Gereken mühürleri toplamanın, uzak mesafeler ve farklı Adeptus Administratum dalları arasındaki koordinasyon eksikliği nedeniyle zor bir görev olduğu anlaşıldı. Hür Tacir, şimdi Dargonus'a dönüp Mühür Üstadı'na belgeyi tasdik ettirmeli.
languages.original_text: Getting the required seals turned out to be quite a task due to the distance and lack of coordination between different Adeptus Administratum branches. Now the Rogue Trader just needs to return to Dargonus and certify the document with the Master of Seals.
